Description:

Snake Blocks is a 3D puzzle game developed by Spooky Cat For Windows, Mac, and Linux, where you must weave a group of colorful snakes through each level, until you've found a way to bring them all to their respective destinations. It uses a unique 3D mechanic to control the snakes, and it contains over 50 levels, 4 modes of difficulty, and a full-featured level editor.

Features:

  • Unique 3D puzzle mechanics.
  • Over 50 tricky, hand-crafted puzzles for you to master.
  • Level editor so you can build and share your own puzzles.
  • Cheerful visual design.
  • Snakes!
